servinfo.title: DTC P0139: O2 Sensor (HO2S) Circuit Slow Response (Sensor-2)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0137 / P0138 / P2A01: O2 Sensor (HO2S) Circuit Low Voltage / High Voltage Range / Performance (Sensor-2):M16A and J20A .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Shifting time which HO2S signal circuit voltage change from 0.5 V to 0.3 V is longer than 1.5 sec. at fuel cut.

item.ptxt: When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.

attention3.ptxt: If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to operating temperature.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool
Drive vehicle at 80 – 100 km/h (50 – 62 mil/h) for 6 min. (keep throttle valve opening constantly in this step.)
Release accelerator pedal, and keep vehicle coasting for 10 sec. with engine braking applied (fuel cut condition).

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:M16A and J20A .

test1.ptxt: Check ground circuits of HO2S-2 for high resistance referring to Step 4 of DTC P0137 / P0138 / P2A01: O2 Sensor (HO2S) Circuit Low Voltage / High Voltage Range / Performance (Sensor-2):M16A and J20A .

Check signal circuits of HO2S-2 for high resistance referring to Step 5 through 7 of DTC P0137 / P0138 / P2A01: O2 Sensor (HO2S) Circuit Low Voltage / High Voltage Range / Performance (Sensor-2):M16A and J20A .

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wiring harness / connector.

test1.ptxt: Replace HO2S. ( Air Fuel Ratio (A/F) Sensor, Heated Oxygen Sensor (HO2S-2) Removal and Installation:M16A and J20A .
Perform DTC confirmation procedure and check DTC.

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
